original_text: Yes, my people, Babylon's army has hurt you very much. But now I have reported to you the message from the Lord Almighty, Israel's God.
korean_text: 내가 짓밟은 너여, 내가 타작한 너여, 내가 이스라엘의 하나님 만군의 여호와께 들은 대로 너희에게 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: Babylon's army has hurt you very much
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 군대가 너희를 매우 아프게 했다

sentences.original_text: But now I have reported to you
the message from the Lord Almighty
